short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart shopping assistant for AliExpress: Find the best coupons, analyze products, get recommendations, and navigate easily in EN/HE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your AliExpress shopping experience smarter with our intelligent shopping assistant.

Key Features:
✓ Automatic Coupon Finder: Get the best available coupons for your purchases with one click
✓ Smart Product Analysis: Quick summary of crucial product information - ratings, number of orders, photo reviews, and seller ratings
✓ Quick Navigation: Easily jump to reviews, product details, and seller information
✓ Multi-currency Support: Works seamlessly with USD, EUR, GBP, and ILS
✓ Multi-language Support: Fully available in English and Hebrew

Note: This extension uses affiliate links which don't affect prices and help support extension development and maintenance.

Shop smarter and make informed decisions on AliExpress!
